mapper.select: select s1.book_name 'goodsName', s1.isbn 'isbn', s1.book_introduce 'goodsDescribe', s1.present_price 'goodsPrice', s1.picture_id 'goodsImagePath', s2.level 'goodsEvaluateScore', s1.author 'goodsAuthor', s1.book_public 'goodsPress', s1.store_name 'storeName' from goods s1 inner join goodseva s2 on s1.book_id = s2.book_id where s1.is_delete = 0 and s2.is_delete = 0 and s1.book_id = #{goodsId}

select user_id 'userAcct', content 'evaluateContent', level 'evaluateScore', create_time 'createTime', imagePath 'imagePath' from goodseva where is_delete = 0 and book_id = #{goodsId}
and level = #{evaluateScore}
select classify_id 'classifyId', classify_name 'classifyName' from goodsclassify where is_delete = 0 and parent_id = 0

select c1.classify_id as fclassify_id, c1.classify_name as fclassify_name, c2.book_id as sbook_id, c2.book_name as sbook_name, c2.picture_id as spicture_id, c2.present_price as spresent_price from goodsclassify c1 left join goods c2 on c1.classify_name = c2.second_classfiy and c1.is_delete = 0 and c2.is_delete = 0 where c1.parent_id = #{classifyId}
